description:
Short-chain platform

The professional platform Vanier brings short-chain products to Ghent shops and restaurants.
The City of Ghent supported the start-up of Vanier, an innovative cooperative platform that brings short-chain products sustainably to shops and restaurants in Ghent. Vanier brings restaurants, institutional kitchens and retailers into contact with producers from the Ghent region. In this way, the market for these producers expands and buyers get a closer relationship with the producers and the products.
name: Short-chain cooperative plaform Vanier, Ghent
